General.Name: TPC Plus Bhd
General.Description: TPC Plus Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the poultry farming business in Malaysia. The company is involved in the production, packaging, and distribution of eggs and poultry feeds to wholesale egg dealers, retailers, fast food restaurants, and food manufacturers. It also engages in the oil palm plantation business; and provision of management services. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Alor Gajah, Malaysia. TPC Plus Berhad is a subsidiary of Huat Lai Resources Berhad.
